casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

March 17, 2010

[Cite as 03/1712010 Case Announcements #2, 2010-Ohio-1048.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-0371. Green v. Foos.

Wood App. No. WD-09-041, 2010-Ohio-93. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
